verses.text: \w Cry|strong="H7121"\w*, cease \w not|strong="H0408"\w*, \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* thy \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w like|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* \w trumpet|strong="H7782"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* shew \w my|strong="H3290"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w their|strong="H5046"\w* wicked doings, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w their|strong="H5046"\w* \w sins|strong="H2403"\w*.

\w For|strong="H4941"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w me|strong="H7592"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, sad \w desire|strong="H2654"\w* \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w know|strong="H1847"\w* \w my|strong="H0834"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* forsaken \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w ask|strong="H7592"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w me|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* willing \w to|strong="H3117"\w* approach \w to|strong="H3117"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w fasted|strong="H6684"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w regarded|strong="H7200"\w*: \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* humbled \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* thou hast \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w taken|strong="H4672"\w* \w notice|strong="H3045"\w*? \w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w exact|strong="H5065"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* debtors.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* debates \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w strife|strong="H7379"\w*. \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w strike|strong="H5221"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w fist|strong="H0106"\w* wickedly. \w Do|strong="H8085"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fast|strong="H6684"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* done until \w this|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w make|strong="H8085"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w high|strong="H4791"\w*.

\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w such|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*: \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w*, \w to|strong="H1961"\w* wind \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* circle, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w spread|strong="H3331"\w* \w sackcloth|strong="H8242"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*? wilt thou \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w acceptable|strong="H7522"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*?

\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w rather|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fast|strong="H6685"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*? \w loose|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w bands|strong="H0092"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*, undo \w the|strong="H3605"\w* bundles \w that|strong="H3605"\w* oppress, \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w broken|strong="H5423"\w* \w go|strong="H7971"\w* \w free|strong="H2670"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w break|strong="H5423"\w* asunder \w every|strong="H3605"\w* burden.

Deal thy \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w needy|strong="H6041"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* harbourless \w into|strong="H0935"\w* thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w when|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w*, \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* despise \w not|strong="H3808"\w* thy own \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w break|strong="H1234"\w* \w forth|strong="H6779"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w morning|strong="H7837"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* thy \w health|strong="H0724"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w speedily|strong="H4120"\w* arise, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* thy \w justice|strong="H6664"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* thee \w up|strong="H6779"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w call|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* hear: thou shalt \w cry|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Here|strong="H2005"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w*. \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w take|strong="H5493"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* chain \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* cease \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w stretch|strong="H7971"\w* \w out|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w finger|strong="H0676"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H3068"\w* which profiteth \w not|strong="H0518"\w*.

When thou shalt pour out thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w to|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* \w hungry|strong="H7457"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* shalt \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* afflicted \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* then \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w rise|strong="H2224"\w* \w up|strong="H2224"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w*, \w and|strong="H5315"\w* thy \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7646"\w* noonday.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w rest|strong="H1961"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w fill|strong="H7646"\w* thy \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* brightness, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H2502"\w* thy \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w watered|strong="H7302"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* fountain \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fail|strong="H3576"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w places|strong="H2723"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w been|strong="H5769"\w* desolate \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w ages|strong="H5769"\w* \w shall|strong="H3427"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* thee: thou shalt \w raise|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w foundations|strong="H4146"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w generation|strong="H1755"\w*: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H7725"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w repairer|strong="H1443"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* fences, \w turning|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w paths|strong="H5410"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* rest.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w*, \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* thy own \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w delightful|strong="H2656"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorious|strong="H3513"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w glorify|strong="H3513"\w* \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w while|strong="H3117"\w* thou dost \w not|strong="H0518"\w* thy own \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy own \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H0518"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w*: \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* shalt thou \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w delighted|strong="H6026"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* lift thee \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w high|strong="H1116"\w* \w places|strong="H1116"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w feed|strong="H0398"\w* thee \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.
